Module.Content: <script language="JavaScript" type="text/JavaScript"> <!-- function HDD_Menu(targetpage,selected){ if (selected.options[selected.selectedIndex].value!=""){ eval(targetpage+".location='"+selected.options[selected.selectedIndex].value+"'");}} //--> </script><select name="FORUMS" onChange="HDD_Menu('parent',this)" style="color:#EB191E; background:#F1F345; font-weight:bold;" > <option value="" selected>FORUMS</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjatestsite/discussions">Talk About Anything</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjatestsite/f-jam-news">Site News</option> <option value="https://www.facebook.com/groups/131537443544094/" target="_blank">F-Jam On Facebook</option> </select>
